name: Clean Underwear Interactive Survey
description:
Please remember to copy your answers at the end and send them to dirtylaundrysurvey@gmail.com.

If you don't, I won't get your responses at all!

This is an interactive virtual environment designed to allow people to explore and give me feedback. This information will be used for educational purposes (this was designed for a college class and for entering the RSA student design competition). Your answers will help further underwear technology!

For this survey I am looking for adult (18+) women (or feminine identifying) people to answer the survey.

Click on different items on the screen to interact with them. Interact with the objects like you would in real life (and answer the questions accordingly), so we can get accurate survey data. Thank you for participating!

Thank you to Minebolt for the programming!

Programming done by Joshua Woodie (Minebolt) and ideas, art direction, drawings, and design by Rebecca Woodie.
